text: CGL may refer to: *Carrier Grade Linux *Catalyst Game Labs *Core OpenGL: Apple Computer's Macintosh Quartz windowing system interface to the Mac OS X implementation of the OpenGL specification *Conway's Game of Life *Chronic granulocytic leukemia, also known as Chronic myelogenous leukemia *Confederazione Generale del Lavoro *Commercial General Liability, a common type of liability insurance *CGL (charity)
title: CGL
